application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 and T2 - Cherry Trees - 1m crown reduction from 4m high to 3m high; and 4m wide to 3m wide due to them being too big for the space and to keep on top of general maintenance of the trees.T3 - Holly Tree - reduce from 6m high to 4.5m high; and from 4m wide to 3m wide due to it encroaching on the neighbour's garden and fence; and it is too near the gutters and buildings of the house.T4 - Tree of Heaven - Crown reduce from 14m high to 12m high; and from 11m wide to 9m wide due to it being too large for the garden and it has been previously priced before so sensible to reduce any risks of snap outs.T5 - Apple Tree - crown reduction from 4m to 3m high; and from 4m to 3m wide due to it being too large for the garden and to maintain tree's health .T6 - walnut tree - reduce the crown from 5m to 4m high; and 4m to 3m wide due to it needing its three yearly maintenance reduction. T7 - Holm Oak - reduce back to previous points of reduction from 19m high to 17m high; and from 15m wide to 13m wide due to it being too large for the area and keeping up with general maintenance T8 - Oak Tree - reduce back to previous points of reduction from 22m high to 20m high; and from 20m wide to 18m wide due to it being too large for the area and keeping up with general maintenance T9 - Green Gage - light reduction from 3m to 2m wide; and 2m to 1.5m wide so that general maintenance is kept.
